# 🎄 Advent of Code 🎄 

My solutions to Advent of Code challenges, written in Python 🐍 

## 🖳  How to run:

To get started run the script found in [scripts/require.sh][require] to install requirements that are necessary to run the solutions.

```bash
./scripts/require.sh
```
